00025 XITC503::XITC503(const char *name, bool runtime,
00026                  const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00027                  const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00028                  const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00029                  const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers)
00030     : XOxfordDriver<XTempControl>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00031 {
00032     const char *channels_create[] = {"1", "2", "3", 0L};
00033     const char *excitations_create[] = {0L};
00034     createChannels(scalarentries, thermometers, true, channels_create, excitations_create);
00035 }
00036 void
00037 XITC503::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00038 {
00039     start();
00040 
00041     if(!shared_ptr<XDCSource>(*extDCSource())) {
00042         heaterMode()->clear();
00043         heaterMode()->add("PID");
00044         heaterMode()->add("Man");
00045     }
00046     powerRange()->setUIEnabled(false);
00047 }
00048 double
00049 XITC503::getRaw(shared_ptr<XChannel> &channel)
00050 {
00051     interface()->send("X");
00052     return read(QString(channel->getName()).toInt());
00053 }
00054 double
00055 XITC503::getHeater()
00056 {
00057     return read(5);
00058 }

00060 XITC503::onPChanged(double p)
00061 {
00062     interface()->sendf("P%f", p);
00063 }

00065 XITC503::onIChanged(double i){
00066     interface()->sendf("I%f", i);
00067 }
00068 void
00069 XITC503::onDChanged(double d){
00070     interface()->sendf("D%f", d);
00071 }
00072 void
00073 XITC503::onTargetTempChanged(double temp){
00074     if(heaterMode()->to_str() == "PID")
00075         interface()->sendf("T%f", temp);
00076 }
00077 void
00078 XITC503::onManualPowerChanged(double pow){
00079     if(heaterMode()->to_str() == "Man")
00080         interface()->sendf("O%f", pow);
00081 }

00084 }

00090     interface()->send("H" + ch->getName());
00091 }

00095 }

00097 XAVS47IB::XAVS47IB(const char *name, bool runtime,
00098                    const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00099                    const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00100                    const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00101                    const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00102     XCharDeviceDriver<XTempControl>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00103 {
00104     const char *channels_create[] = {"0", "1", "2", "3", "4", "5", "6", "7", 0L};
00105     const char *excitations_create[] = {"0", "3uV", "10uV", "30uV", "100uV", "300uV", "1mV", "3mV", 0L};
00106     createChannels(scalarentries, thermometers, false, channels_create, excitations_create);
00107   
00108     //    UseSerialPollOnWrite = false;
00109     //    UseSerialPollOnRead = false;
00110     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeWrite(10); //10msec
00111     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeRead(10); //10msec
00112 
00113 //  manualPower()->disable();
00114 }
00115 double
00116 XAVS47IB::read(const char *str)
00117 {
00118     double x = 0;
00119     interface()->queryf("%s?", str);
00120     char buf[4];
00121     if(interface()->scanf("%3s %lf", buf, &x) != 2)
00122         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00123     if(strncmp(buf, str, 3))
00124         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00125     return x;
00126 }
00127 void
00128 XAVS47IB::onPChanged(double p)
00129 {
00130     int ip = lrint(p);
00131     if(ip > 60) ip = 60;
00132     if(ip < 5) ip = 5;
00133     ip = lrint(ip / 5.0 - 1.0);
00134     interface()->sendf("PRO %u", ip);
00135 }
00136 void
00137 XAVS47IB::onIChanged(double i)
00138 {
00139     int ii = lrint(i);
00140     if(ii > 4000) ii = 4000;
00141     ii = (ii < 2) ? 0 : lrint(log10((double)ii) * 3.0);
00142     interface()->sendf("ITC %u", ii);
00143 }
00144 void
00145 XAVS47IB::onDChanged(double d)
00146 {
00147     int id = lrint(d);
00148     id = (id < 1) ? 0 : lrint(log10((double)id) * 3.0) + 1;
00149     interface()->sendf("DTC %u", id);
00150 }
00151 void
00152 XAVS47IB::onTargetTempChanged(double) {
00153     setPoint();
00154 }
00155 void
00156 XAVS47IB::onManualPowerChanged(double) {}
00157 void
00158 XAVS47IB::onHeaterModeChanged(int) {}
00159 void
00160 XAVS47IB::onPowerRangeChanged(int ran) {
00161     setPowerRange(ran);
00162 }
00163 void
00164 XAVS47IB::onCurrentChannelChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &ch) {
00165     interface()->send("ARN 0;INP 0;ARN 0;RAN 7");
00166     interface()->sendf("DIS 0;MUX %u;ARN 0", QString(currentChannel()->to_str()).toInt());
00167     if(*ch->excitation() >= 1)
00168         interface()->sendf("EXC %u", (unsigned int)(*ch->excitation()));
00169     msecsleep(1500);
00170     interface()->send("ARN 0;INP 1;ARN 0;RAN 6");
00171     m_autorange_wait = 0;
00172 }
00173 void
00174 XAVS47IB::onExcitationChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &ch, int exc) {
00175     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00176     if(!interface()->isOpened()) return;
00177     if(ch != shared_ptr<XChannel>(*currentChannel())) return;
00178     interface()->sendf("EXC %u", (unsigned int)exc);
00179     m_autorange_wait = 0;
00180 
00181     powerRange()->add("0");
00182     powerRange()->add("1uW");
00183     powerRange()->add("10uW");
00184     powerRange()->add("100uW");
00185     powerRange()->add("1mW");
00186     powerRange()->add("10mW");
00187     powerRange()->add("100mW");
00188     powerRange()->add("1W");
00189 }
00190 
00191 double
00192 XAVS47IB::getRaw(shared_ptr<XChannel> &)
00193 {
00194     return getRes();
00195 }
00196 void
00197 XAVS47IB::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00198 {
00199     msecsleep(50);
00200     interface()->send("REM 1;ARN 0;DIS 0");
00201     currentChannel()->str(formatString("%d", (int)lrint(read("MUX"))));
00202     onCurrentChannelChanged(*currentChannel());
00203 
00204     start();
00205 
00206     if(!shared_ptr<XDCSource>(*extDCSource())) {
00207         heaterMode()->clear();
00208         heaterMode()->add("PID");
00209     }
00210 }
00211 void
00212 XAVS47IB::afterStop()
00213 {
00214     try {
00215         interface()->send("REM 0"); //LOCAL
00216     }
00217     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError &e) {
00218         e.print(getLabel());
00219     }
00220   
00221     close();
00222 }
00223 
00224 int
00225 XAVS47IB::setRange(unsigned int range)
00226 {
00227     int rangebuf = (int)*powerRange();
00228     interface()->send("POW 0");
00229     if(range > 7) range = 7;
00230     interface()->queryf("ARN 0;RAN %u;*OPC?", range);
00231     setPoint();
00232     interface()->sendf("POW %u", rangebuf);
00233 
00234     m_autorange_wait = 0;
00235     return 0;
00236 }
00237 
00238 double
00239 XAVS47IB::getRes()
00240 {
00241     double x;
00242     { XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00243     int wait = interface()->gpibWaitBeforeRead();
00244     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeRead(300);
00245     interface()->query("AVE 1;*OPC?");
00246     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeRead(wait);
00247     x = read("AVE");
00248     }      
00249     if(m_autorange_wait++ > 10)
00250     {
00251         int range = getRange();
00252         if(lrint(read("OVL")) == 0)
00253         {
00254             if(fabs(x) < 0.1 * pow(10.0, range - 1))
00255                 setRange(std::max(range - 1, 1));
00256             if(fabs(x) > 1.6 * pow(10.0, range - 1))
00257                 setRange(std::min(range + 1, 7));
00258         }
00259         else
00260         {
00261             setRange(std::min(range + 1, 7));
00262         }  
00263     }
00264     return x;
00265 }
00266 int
00267 XAVS47IB::getRange()
00268 {
00269     return lrint(read("RAN"));
00270 }
00271 int
00272 XAVS47IB::setPoint()
00273 {
00274     shared_ptr<XChannel> ch = *currentChannel();
00275     if(!ch) return -1;
00276     shared_ptr<XThermometer> thermo = *ch->thermometer();
00277     if(!thermo) return -1;
00278     double res = thermo->getRawValue(*targetTemp());
00279     //the unit is 100uV
00280     int val = lrint(10000.0 * res / pow(10.0, getRange() - 1));
00281     val = std::min(val, 20000);
00282     interface()->sendf("SPT %d", val);
00283     return 0;
00284 }
00285 
00286 int
00287 XAVS47IB::setBias(unsigned int bias)
00288 {
00289     interface()->sendf("BIA %u", bias);
00290     return 0;
00291 }
00292 void
00293 XAVS47IB::setPowerRange(int range)
00294 {
00295     interface()->sendf("POW %u", range);
00296 }
00297 double
00298 XAVS47IB::getHeater()
00299 {
00300     return read("HTP");
00301 }

00303 XCryocon::XCryocon(const char *name, bool runtime,
00304                    const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00305                    const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00306                    const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00307                    const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00308     XCharDeviceDriver<XTempControl>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00309 {
00310     interface()->setEOS("");
00311     interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnWrite(false);
00312     interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnRead (false);
00313     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeWrite(20);
00314     //    ExclusiveWaitAfterWrite = 10;
00315     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeRead(20);
00316 }
00317 XCryoconM62::XCryoconM62(const char *name, bool runtime,
00318                          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00319                          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00320                          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00321                          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00322     XCryocon(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00323 {
00324     const char *channels_create[] = {"A", "B", 0L};
00325     const char *excitations_create[] = {"10UV", "30UV", "100UV", "333UV", "1.0MV", "3.3MV", 0L};
00326     createChannels(scalarentries, thermometers, true, channels_create, excitations_create);
00327 }
00328 XCryoconM32::XCryoconM32(const char *name, bool runtime,
00329                          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00330                          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00331                          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00332                          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00333     XCryocon(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00334 {
00335     const char *channels_create[] = {"A", "B", 0L};
00336     const char *excitations_create[] = {"CI", "10MV", "3MV", "1MV", 0L};
00337     createChannels(scalarentries, thermometers, true, channels_create, excitations_create);
00338 }
00339 void
00340 XCryocon::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00341 {
00342     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(channels()->children());
00343     shared_ptr<XChannel> ch0 = dynamic_pointer_cast<XChannel>(list->at(0));
00344     shared_ptr<XChannel> ch1 = dynamic_pointer_cast<XChannel>(list->at(1));
00345     interface()->query("INPUT A:VBIAS?");
00346     ch0->excitation()->str(QString(&interface()->buffer()[0]).simplified());
00347     interface()->query("INPUT B:VBIAS?");
00348     ch1->excitation()->str(QString(&interface()->buffer()[0]).simplified());
00349 
00350     powerRange()->clear();
00351     interface()->query("HEATER:RANGE?");
00352     powerRange()->str(QString(&interface()->buffer()[0]).simplified());
00353 
00354     if(!shared_ptr<XDCSource>(*extDCSource())) {
00355         getChannel();
00356         interface()->query("HEATER:PMAN?");
00357         manualPower()->str(XString(&interface()->buffer()[0]));
00358         interface()->query("HEATER:PGAIN?");
00359         prop()->str(XString(&interface()->buffer()[0]));
00360         interface()->query("HEATER:IGAIN?");
00361         interval()->str(XString(&interface()->buffer()[0]));
00362         interface()->query("HEATER:DGAIN?");
00363         deriv()->str(XString(&interface()->buffer()[0]));
00364 
00365         if(!shared_ptr<XDCSource>(*extDCSource())) {
00366             heaterMode()->clear();
00367             heaterMode()->add("OFF");
00368             heaterMode()->add("PID");
00369             heaterMode()->add("MAN");
00370         }
00371         interface()->query("HEATER:TYPE?");
00372         QString s(&interface()->buffer()[0]);
00373         heaterMode()->str(s.simplified());
00374     }
00375 
00376     start();
00377 }
00378 void
00379 XCryoconM32::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00380 {
00381     XCryocon::open();
00382 
00383     powerRange()->add("HI");
00384     powerRange()->add("MID");
00385     powerRange()->add("LOW");
00386 }
00387 void
00388 XCryoconM62::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00389 {
00390     XCryocon::open();
00391 
00392     interface()->query("HEATER:LOAD?");
00393     if(interface()->toInt() == 50)
00394     {
00395         powerRange()->add("0.05W");
00396         powerRange()->add("0.5W");
00397         powerRange()->add("5.0W");
00398         powerRange()->add("50W");
00399     }
00400     else
00401     {
00402         powerRange()->add("0.03W");
00403         powerRange()->add("0.3W");
00404         powerRange()->add("2.5W");
00405         powerRange()->add("25W");
00406     }
00407 }

00418     interface()->sendf("HEATER:DGAIN %f", d);

00439 }
00440 void
00441 XCryocon::onExcitationChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &ch, int) {
00442     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00443     if(!interface()->isOpened()) return;
00444     interface()->send("INPUT " + ch->getName() +
00445                       ":VBIAS " + ch->excitation()->to_str());
00446 }
00447 void
00448 XCryocon::setTemp(double temp)
00449 {
00450     if(temp > 0)
00451         control();
00452     else
00453         stopControl();
00454 
00455     shared_ptr<XThermometer> thermo = *(shared_ptr<XChannel>(*currentChannel()))->thermometer();
00456     if(thermo)
00457         setHeaterSetPoint(thermo->getRawValue(temp));
00458     else
00459         setHeaterSetPoint(temp);
00460 }
00461 double
00462 XCryocon::getRaw(shared_ptr<XChannel> &channel)
00463 {
00464     double x;
00465     x = getInput(channel);
00466     return x;
00467 }
00468 void
00469 XCryocon::getChannel()
00470 {
00471     interface()->query("HEATER:SOURCE?");
00472     char s[3];
00473     if(interface()->scanf("CH%s", s) != 1) return;
00474     currentChannel()->str(XString(s));
00475 }
00476 void
00477 XCryocon::setHeaterMode(void)
00478 {
00479     if(heaterMode()->to_str() == "Off")
00480         stopControl();
00481     else
00482         control();
00483 
00484     interface()->send("HEATER:TYPE " + heaterMode()->to_str());
00485 }
00486 double
00487 XCryocon::getHeater(void)
00488 {
00489     interface()->query("HEATER:OUTP?");
00490     return interface()->toDouble();
00491 }
00492 
00493 int
00494 XCryocon::control()
00495 {
00496     interface()->send("CONTROL");
00497     return 0;
00498 }
00499 int
00500 XCryocon::stopControl()
00501 {
00502     interface()->send("STOP");
00503     return 0;
00504 }
00505 double
00506 XCryocon::getInput(shared_ptr<XChannel> &channel)
00507 {
00508     interface()->query("INPUT? " + channel->getName());
00509     double x;
00510     if(interface()->scanf("%lf", &x) != 1) x = 0.0;
00511     return x;
00512 }

00521 XNeoceraLTC21::XNeoceraLTC21(const char *name, bool runtime,
00522                              const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00523                              const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00524                              const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00525                              const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers)
00526     : XCharDeviceDriver<XTempControl>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00527 {
00528     const char *channels_create[] = {"1", "2", 0L};
00529     const char *excitations_create[] = {0L};
00530 //  const char *excitations_create[] = {"1mV", "320uV", "100uV", "32uV", "10uV", 0L};
00531     createChannels(scalarentries, thermometers, true, channels_create, excitations_create);
00532     interface()->setEOS("");
00533     powerRange()->add("0");
00534     powerRange()->add("0.05W");
00535     powerRange()->add("0.5W");
00536     powerRange()->add("5W");
00537     powerRange()->add("50W");
00538 }
00539 void
00540 XNeoceraLTC21::control()
00541 {
00542     interface()->send("SCONT;");
00543 }
00544 void
00545 XNeoceraLTC21::monitor()
00546 {
00547     interface()->send("SMON;");
00548 }
00549 
00550 double
00551 XNeoceraLTC21::getRaw(shared_ptr<XChannel> &channel)
00552 {
00553     interface()->query("QSAMP?" + channel->getName() + ";");
00554     double x;
00555     if(interface()->scanf("%7lf", &x) != 1)
00556         return 0.0;
00557     return x;
00558 }
00559 double
00560 XNeoceraLTC21::getHeater()
00561 {
00562     interface()->query("QHEAT?;");
00563     double x;
00564     if(interface()->scanf("%5lf", &x) != 1)
00565         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00566     return x;
00567 }
00568 void
00569 XNeoceraLTC21::setHeater()
00570 {
00571     interface()->sendf("SPID1,%f,%f,%f,%f,100.0;",
00572          (double)*prop(), (double)*interval(), (double)*deriv(), (double)*manualPower());
00573 }
00574 void
00575 XNeoceraLTC21::onPChanged(double /*p*/)
00576 {
00577     setHeater();
00578 }
00579 void
00580 XNeoceraLTC21::onIChanged(double /*i*/)
00581 {
00582     setHeater();
00583 }
00584 void

00586 {
00587     setHeater();
00588 }
00589 void
00590 XNeoceraLTC21::onTargetTempChanged(double temp)
00591 {
00592     interface()->sendf("SETP1,%.5f;", temp);
00593 }
00594 void
00595 XNeoceraLTC21::onManualPowerChanged(double /*pow*/)
00596 {
00597     setHeater();
00598 }
00599 void
00600 XNeoceraLTC21::onHeaterModeChanged(int x)
00601 {
00602     if(x < 6) {
00603         interface()->sendf("SHCONT%d;", x);
00604         control();
00605     }
00606     else
00607         monitor();
00608 }
00609 void
00610 XNeoceraLTC21::onPowerRangeChanged(int ran)
00611 {
00612     interface()->sendf("SHMXPWR%d;", ran);
00613 }
00614 void
00615 XNeoceraLTC21::onCurrentChannelChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &cch)
00616 {
00617     int ch = atoi(cch->getName().c_str());
00618     if(ch < 1) ch = 3;
00619     interface()->sendf("SOSEN1,%d;", ch);
00620 }
00621 void
00622 XNeoceraLTC21::onExcitationChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &, int)
00623 {
00624     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00625     if(!interface()->isOpened()) return;
00626 }
00627 void
00628 XNeoceraLTC21::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00629 {
00630     if(!shared_ptr<XDCSource>(*extDCSource())) {
00631         interface()->query("QOUT?1;");
00632         int sens, cmode, range;
00633         if(interface()->scanf("%1d;%1d;%1d;", &sens, &cmode, &range) != 3)
00634             throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00635         currentChannel()->str(formatString("%d", sens));
00636         
00637         heaterMode()->clear();
00638         heaterMode()->add("AUTO P");
00639         heaterMode()->add("AUTO PI");
00640         heaterMode()->add("AUTO PID");
00641         heaterMode()->add("PID");
00642         heaterMode()->add("TABLE");
00643         heaterMode()->add("DEFAULT");
00644         heaterMode()->add("MONITOR");
00645 
00646         heaterMode()->value(cmode);
00647         powerRange()->value(range);
00648     
00649         interface()->query("QPID?1;");
00650         double p, i, d, power, limit;
00651         if(interface()->scanf("%lf;%lf;%lf;%lf;%lf;", &p, &i, &d, &power, &limit) != 5)
00652             throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00653         prop()->value(p);
00654         interval()->value(i);
00655         deriv()->value(d);
00656         manualPower()->value(power);
00657     }
00658     start();
00659 }
00660 
00661 XLakeShore340::XLakeShore340(const char *name, bool runtime,
00662                              const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00663                              const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00664                              const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00665                              const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers)
00666     : XCharDeviceDriver<XTempControl>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00667 {
00668     const char *channels_create[] = {"A", "B", 0L};
00669     const char *excitations_create[] = {0L};
00670     createChannels(scalarentries, thermometers, true, channels_create, excitations_create);
00671     interface()->setEOS("");
00672     interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnWrite(false);
00673     interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnRead (false);
00674     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeWrite(40);
00675     //    ExclusiveWaitAfterWrite = 10;
00676     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeRead(40); 
00677 }
00678 
00679 double
00680 XLakeShore340::getRaw(shared_ptr<XChannel> &channel)
00681 {
00682     shared_ptr<XThermometer> thermo = *channel->thermometer();
00683     if(thermo && !dynamic_pointer_cast<XRawThermometer>(thermo))
00684         interface()->query("SRDG? " + channel->getName());
00685     else
00686         interface()->query("KRDG? " + channel->getName());
00687     return interface()->toDouble();
00688 }
00689 double
00690 XLakeShore340::getHeater()
00691 {
00692     interface()->query("HTR?");
00693     return interface()->toDouble();
00694 }
00695 void
00696 XLakeShore340::onPChanged(double p)
00697 {
00698     interface()->sendf("PID 1,%f", p);
00699 }
00700 void
00701 XLakeShore340::onIChanged(double i)
00702 {
00703     interface()->sendf("PID 1,,%f", i);
00704 }
00705 void
00706 XLakeShore340::onDChanged(double d)
00707 {
00708     interface()->sendf("PID 1,,,%f", d);
00709 }
00710 void
00711 XLakeShore340::onTargetTempChanged(double temp)
00712 {
00713     shared_ptr<XThermometer> thermo = *(shared_ptr<XChannel>(*currentChannel()))->thermometer();
00714     if(thermo && !dynamic_pointer_cast<XRawThermometer>(thermo)) {
00715         interface()->sendf("CSET 1,%s,3,1", (const char*)currentChannel()->to_str().c_str());
00716         temp = thermo->getRawValue(temp);
00717     }
00718     else {
00719         interface()->sendf("CSET 1,%s,1,1", (const char*)currentChannel()->to_str().c_str());
00720     }
00721     interface()->sendf("SETP 1,%f", temp);
00722 }
00723 void
00724 XLakeShore340::onManualPowerChanged(double pow)
00725 {
00726     interface()->sendf("MOUT 1,%f", pow);
00727 }
00728 void
00729 XLakeShore340::onHeaterModeChanged(int)
00730 {
00731     if(heaterMode()->to_str() == "Off")
00732     {
00733         interface()->send("RANGE 0");
00734     }
00735     if(heaterMode()->to_str() == "PID")
00736     {
00737         interface()->send("CMODE 1");
00738     }
00739     if(heaterMode()->to_str() == "Man")
00740     {
00741         interface()->send("CMODE 3");
00742     }
00743 }
00744 void
00745 XLakeShore340::onPowerRangeChanged(int ran)
00746 {
00747     interface()->sendf("RANGE %d", ran + 1);
00748 }
00749 void
00750 XLakeShore340::onCurrentChannelChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &ch)
00751 {
00752     interface()->sendf("CSET 1,%s", (const char *)ch->getName().c_str());
00753 }
00754 void
00755 XLakeShore340::onExcitationChanged(const shared_ptr<XChannel> &, int)
00756 {
00757     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00758     if(!interface()->isOpened()) return;
00759 }
00760 void
00761 XLakeShore340::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00762 {
00763     interface()->query("CDISP? 1");
00764     int res, maxcurr;
00765     if(interface()->scanf("%*d,%d", &res) != 1)
00766         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00767     interface()->query("CLIMIT? 1");
00768     if(interface()->scanf("%*f,%*f,%*f,%d", &maxcurr) != 1)
00769         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00770 
00771     powerRange()->clear();
00772     for(int i = 1; i < 6; i++) {
00773         powerRange()->add(formatString("%.1f W",
00774                                             (double)pow(10.0, i - 5.0)  * pow(maxcurr, 2.0) * res));
00775     }
00776     if(!shared_ptr<XDCSource>(*extDCSource())) {
00777         interface()->query("CSET? 1");
00778         char ch[2];
00779         if(interface()->scanf("%1s", ch) == 1)
00780             currentChannel()->str(XString(ch));
00781         
00782         heaterMode()->clear();
00783         heaterMode()->add("Off");
00784         heaterMode()->add("PID");
00785         heaterMode()->add("Man");
00786 
00787         interface()->query("CMODE? 1");
00788         switch(interface()->toInt()) {
00789         case 1:
00790             heaterMode()->str(XString("PID"));
00791             break;
00792         case 3:
00793             heaterMode()->str(XString("Man"));
00794             break;
00795         default:
00796             break;
00797         }
00798         interface()->query("RANGE?");
00799         int range = interface()->toInt();
00800         if(range == 0)
00801             heaterMode()->str(XString("Off"));
00802         else
00803             powerRange()->value(range - 1);
00804     
00805         interface()->query("MOUT? 1");
00806         manualPower()->value(interface()->toDouble());
00807         interface()->query("PID? 1");
00808         double p, i, d;
00809         if(interface()->scanf("%lf,%lf,%lf", &p, &i, &d) != 3)
00810             throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00811         prop()->value(p);
00812         interval()->value(i);
00813         deriv()->value(d);
00814     }
00815     start();
00816 }
